attributes.action: Government to help medium and small businesses to cover 75% of employee's salary
attributes.additional_details: I work in a travel industry and fear for my job. I am just one of many. I am sure that without Government's help employers will very soon either stop paying , cut our pay or make us all redundant. Companies need a lot of help to survive as eventually situation with travel around the globe will go back to normal.  We need to keep it afloat !
attributes.background: Government to help medium and small businesses in affected by coronavirus sectors to cover 75% of employee's salary for a period of 3 months to prevent job losses. Follow in footsteps of Danish government .

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced the Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme to enable workers to be paid up to 80% of a worker’s wages, up to a total of £2,500 per worker each month: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-announces-workers-support-package

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
